thread.section_title: David Sklar & Associates Inc. Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of David Sklar & Associates Inc. | davidsklar.com
thread.title: R.H.
thread.title_full: David Sklar & Associates Inc. reviewed by R.H.

author: R.H.
title: R.H.
text: Thanks to Sklar & Associates I have regained control of my life. I am no longer chained to my debt - including student loans - and I can now manage my money better. All the agents I have come into contact with have been more than sincere and courteous and I recommend Sklar to anyone for anything from a consultation to bankruptcy.
